name: Dorannia
notes: Exotic fluid-ocean world with methane atmosphere. Mining colony. Jump point for travel to Sword Worlds border.

celestialObjects.name: Dorannia Primary

stellarInfo.description: An orange main sequence dwarf star. Relatively cool and stable.

celestialObjects.gmNotes: K4 V orange main sequence star. Mass 0.73 Sol, Luminosity 0.33.

celestialObjects.name: Dorannia
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Large world with corrosive methane atmosphere. Fluid oceans. Pop ~3 million. TL9. Mining colony.

celestialObjects.name: Dorannia Highport
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Class B starport. Good facilities. Refined fuel available.

celestialObjects.name: Dorannia Gas Giant I
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Inner gas giant. Good for wilderness refueling.

roleContent.captain: Rumors of Garoovian bounty hunters frequenting the system. Keep a low profile.
roleContent.astrogator: Good jump routes to Ator (J-1) or direct to Flammarion (J-2). Review approach vectors.
roleContent.pilot: Fluid oceans make landing dangerous. Orbital docking recommended.
roleContent.engineer: Fuel skimming from gas giant possible. Recommend refined fuel from starport.
roleContent.sensors: High methane atmosphere creates sensor distortion near planet. Clear readings in outer system.
roleContent.gunner: Target practice asteroids in the belt. Request authorization from Captain.
roleContent.medic: Methane atmosphere exposure requires decontamination protocols.
roleContent.steward: Limited passenger traffic. Mining crews may need transport.
roleContent.cargo: Processed methane exports. Mining equipment imports.

news.headline: MINING OUTPUT INCREASES 12%
news.content: Q3 production figures exceed projections. Methane exports to rimward systems continue to grow.

news.headline: STARPORT UPGRADES APPROVED
news.content: Dorannia Highport receives funding for berthing expansion. Work expected to complete 1106.

news.headline: TRAVEL ADVISORY: SWORD WORLDS BORDER
news.content: Heightened naval activity along Sword Worlds frontier. Commercial vessels advised to verify documentation.

captain.subject: Warning
captain.content: Word is that Garoovian agents have been asking questions at the last three starports. They know your ship. Consider a new transponder code. - A Friend

astrogator.subject: Updated Route Data
astrogator.content: Attached: Latest jump calibration data for the Ator-Flammarion corridor. Binary star corrections included.

engineer.subject: Recall Notice
engineer.content: Your ship model may be affected by the TL9 fuel processor seal recall. Inspection recommended at next class A port.

medic.subject: Medical Advisory
medic.content: Tainted atmosphere exposure protocols updated. New decontamination procedures effective immediately.
